title: Any opinions on Font Squirrel?
content:
We're checking out this fontface generator for an upcoming web project. I'm wondering if anybody's used it and issues you've possibly encountered.

[http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fontface/generator](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213335/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fontface/generator "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fontface/generator")
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: i'm curious what you found out.
I'm torn. I like fonts, but hate squirrels.
I'm late to the party, but I'm happy to answer any questions.
We used it to churn out a TT version of our custom OTF typeface. So far so good. Which my developer tells me is more cross-browser compatible.
